title: Red Chilly Onion Chutney/ Erra karam Chutney
content:
Ingredients: Dry Red chillies - 4 (soak 6 hours) Two medium sized Onion - chopped - one bowl Red chilli powder - 1/2 sp Jaggery powder - 1/2 tb sp Tamarind paste - 1 tb sp Salt - as per taste Procedure:
  • Add soaked dry Red chillies, jaggery powder, tamarind paste, red chili powder and salt in mixer grinder blend it till smooth paste
  • Next add chopped onion in it. Blend till smooth paste
  • Transfer red chilly onion chutney/ Erra karam into a bowl
  • Serve it with Dosa/ Idly
  • South Indian special Karam Dosa/ Erra karam Dosa
